overview: DED shows Martine Syms's digital avatar-based on a 3-D scan of her body—in a vast virtual landscape against an infinite horizon. She casually walks among other characters, runs, bleeds, and excretes. Her t-shirt back reads “TO HELL WITH MY SUFFERING”. The main refrain of the soundtrack, composed and performed by Syms, reverberates: "I want to give and receive infinite possibilities."
title: DED
